alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 1:25AM CDT until May 14 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN BLAINE COUNTY... At 125 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Hitchcock, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watonga, Canton, Longdale, Hitchcock, Eagle City and Southard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
